statements: SELECT * FROM HedgeFundData;
SELECT fund_name, total_assets FROM HedgeFundData ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, strategy FROM HedgeFundData WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundData WHERE strategy = 'Equity';
SELECT fund_name, manager_id FROM HedgeFundData ORDER BY inception_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundData WHERE total_assets > 1000000 ORDER BY fund_id DESC
SELECT fund_name, total_assets FROM HedgeFundData ORDER BY total_assets DESC, inception_date ASC
SELECT fund_name, strategy, total_assets FROM HedgeFundData WHERE strategy='Long/Short' AND total_assets > 5000000
SELECT fund_name, total_assets FROM HedgeFundData WHERE inception_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundData WHERE manager_id IN (1,2,3)
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, total_assets FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT fund_name, fund_id, total_assets FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT total_assets, fund_name, fund_id FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT data_id, fund_id, data_source, data_type, data_value FROM fund_data;
SELECT data_value, data_type, data_source, fund_id, data_id FROM fund_data;
SELECT * FROM hedge_funds WHERE fund_id = 1;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name FROM hedge_funds ORDER BY fund_name DESC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, total_assets FROM hedge_funds WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT hf.fund_name, fd.data_source, fd.data_type, fd.data_value FROM hedge_funds hf JOIN fund_data fd ON hf.fund_id = fd.fund_id WHERE fd.data_value < 0;
SELECT * FROM fund_data WHERE data_type = 'Performance' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundInvestors;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investment_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundHoldings ORDER BY holding_name DESC;
SELECT manager_name, experience_years FROM HedgeFundManagers WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT SUM(shares_held) AS total_shares, SUM(market_value) AS total_market_value FROM HedgeFundHoldings;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, experience_years FROM HedgeFundManagers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT holding_name, shares_held, market_value FROM HedgeFundHoldings WHERE market_value > 10000;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundManagers WHERE performance_rating >= 8.5 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_accounts;
SELECT fund_name, investor_name, investment_amount FROM hedge_fund_accounts WHERE investment_amount > 100000;
SELECT account_id, fund_name FROM hedge_fund_accounts ORDER BY fund_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_positions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT fund_name, year, returns FROM hedge_fund_performance WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_accounts WHERE investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT fund_name, investor_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM hedge_fund_accounts WHERE fund_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY investor_name;

SELECT hfp.fund_name, hfp.year, hfp.returns, hfpos.market_value FROM hedge_fund_performance hfp JOIN hedge_fund_positions hfpos ON hfp.fund_name = hfpos.symbol WHERE hfp.year = 2021 ORDER BY hfpos.market_value DESC;

SELECT hft.trade_id, hft.trade_date, hft.trade_type, hfpos.symbol, hfpos.quantity FROM hedge_fund_trades hft JOIN hedge_fund_positions hfpos ON hft.position_id = hfpos.position_id WHERE hft.trade_amount > 5000 ORDER BY hft.trade_date;

SELECT hfacc.account_id, hfacc.fund_name, hfpos.symbol, SUM(hfpos.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hedge_fund_accounts hfacc JOIN hedge_fund_positions hfpos ON hfacc.account_id = hfpos.account_id GROUP BY hfacc.account_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT fund_name, manager_name, assets_under_management FROM hedge_funds ORDER BY assets_under_management DESC;
SELECT * FROM positions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT fund_name, strategy, assets_under_management FROM hedge_funds WHERE assets_under_management > 1000000;
SELECT trade_date, trade_type, quantity, price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hedge_funds WHERE assets_under_management > 1000000 ORDER BY manager_name DESC, fund_name ASC
SELECT fund_name, manager_name, strategy FROM hedge_funds WHERE strategy = 'Long-Short Equity' AND assets_under_management > 5000000
SELECT p.symbol, p.quantity, t.trade_date, t.trade_type, t.quantity FROM positions p JOIN trades t ON p.id = t.position_id WHERE p.quantity > 1000 ORDER BY t.trade_date DESC
SELECT m.symbol, m.close_price, m.high_price, m.low_price, p.quantity FROM market_data m JOIN positions p ON m.symbol = p.symbol AND m.date = CURDATE()

SELECT h.fund_name, h.assets_under_management, p.quantity, t.trade_type, t.price, t.trade_date FROM hedge_funds h JOIN positions p ON h.id = p.fund_id JOIN trades t ON p.id = t.position_id WHERE h.assets_under_management > 2000000 ORDER BY t.trade_date ASC
